title: Perfect Recipe
description: Perfect Recipe is an idea as a beautiful responsive  website template to share recipe.

title: Portfolio website
description: It's a responsive website as a portfolio for everybody that want to share resume. All data on this sample fetch from json files.

title: MoonlitWitch Shop
description: MoonlitWitch Shop is an online shop sample which is created by react. Its features are fetching data from API, adding products to the cart and removing them using local storage technology.

title: Matching Cards Game
description: Matching cards is a fun game. It is designed in three levels(easy,medium and hard). This game accounts your score, your mistakes and show the time. Try it it's fun...
